source_objects.title: Beauty & Makeup
source_objects.description: From hair styles to makeup tips, fashion tips to ageless secrets, welcome to the ultimate place for beauty & makeup courses.

items.title: Lash Lift, Brow Lamination, and Tint Course For All Levels
items.headline: Learn to perfect the most trendy beauty services: lash lift, brow lamination and tint! Bonus brow shaping included
objectives_summary: Learn how to successfully perform a lash lift
Learn how to successfully perform a brow lamination
Learn how to tint lashes and brows

items.title: How to do pink and white gel and acrylic like a Pro
items.headline: Learn how to do pink and white gel and acrylic efficiently.
objectives_summary: Understand how to get gel or acrylic to stay on clients' nails
File correctly around clients' cuticles
Learn how to apply hovering and circular techniques on gel nails

items.title: LASH LIFT (perming+tinting) complete course
items.headline: Learn how to perform the treatment of lash lift/perming/curl/lamination/botox, accredited certificate possibility
objectives_summary: eyelash curling
eyelash "Botox"
Eyelash lamination

items.title: Creating All Natural Skincare - CPD Accredited
items.headline: Discover how to re-create 9 BEST SELLING recipes, learn the benefits of the ingredients & how to best use the products
objectives_summary: How to easily make ALL natural skincare products using minimal ingredients with recipe guides
The Shelf Life, Safety and Storage of essential oils
What hazardous oils are and why you should avoid them

items.title: Mehndi 101 - How To Master The Art Of Mehndi In Just 4 Hours
items.headline: A step by step guide to become a mehendi expert in 15 days.
objectives_summary: Master the art of mehndi application
Apply beautiful mehndi designs for various occasions

items.title: Gel nail course
items.headline: Hard gel solution package
objectives_summary: Hard gel application - All in one

items.title: Create your own Nail Salon from home
items.headline: Have you always wanted to run your own business from home? Now you can with this all new nail salon from home course.
objectives_summary: Create an income stream from performing a variety of nail treatments
Perform a basic nail manicure
Prepare nails for UV polish application

items.title: Learn to make Human Hair Lace Wig, Full lace wig ventilation
items.headline: the way to ventilate hair on the lace fabric, by ventilating hair on lace, You can create any product: wig, closure, etc
objectives_summary: learn to make a full lace wig
human hair lace wig making
learn how to ventilate hair on lace to make wigs

items.title: Indian Bridal Makeup Masterclass, Professional Make-up
items.headline: Professional Bridal Makeup on Brides with Colorful Wedding Dresses , Latest Eye-Makeup Techniques & Bride Consultation!
objectives_summary: Bride Consultation: How to encounter a bride and meet her expectations on her big day
Trial Makeup appointment : How to proceed and plan the wedding day successfully ahead
3 Different Bridal Makeup Looks : Learn the most popular Eye Makeup Techniques of all times

items.title: "The BASICS Makeup Course" - For Beginners!
items.headline: Everything you need to know about the basics of makeup!
objectives_summary: Everything you need to know about the BASICS of makeup!
The best Skincare Regime for your Skin Type
Killer Base makeup which will last all day long!

items.title: Learn The Art of Henna From The Comfort of Your  Home.
items.headline: Learn how to make your own henna also known as mendhi/mehendi and create beautiful temporary tattoos
objectives_summary: The objective of this course is to introduce the student to the beautiful art of henna to a point that the student is competent enough to prepare and apply henna to themselves or others.

items.title: Human hair wefting course
items.headline: Learn sewing the natural human hair into weft hair extension
objectives_summary: learn wefting the hair
technology of sewing hair with a sewing machine

items.title: Transform Your Personal Appearance using Fashion and Make-up
items.headline: Learn how to dress for your body and become your own personal stylist
objectives_summary: Increase confidence and self-esteem
Save valuable time coordinating and purchasing their wardrobe
Optimize their wardrobe

items.title: Aromatherapy: How to Make EO Blends and Natural Perfumes
items.headline: Learn how to make essential oil blends, alcohol, oil and cream based natural perfumes for personal use or retail sales.
objectives_summary: You will know how to Make Essential Oil Blends
You will understand the differences between Top Middle and Base Notes for Perfume Blending
You will know how to Make Natural Alcohol Spray Perfume

items.title: Special Effects (fx) Makeup Level 2

visible_instructors.display_name: Academy of Film Fashion and Design
visible_instructors.name: Academy of Film
visible_instructors.title: Academy of Film Fashion and Design

items.headline: Fundamental Concepts of FX Makeup
objectives_summary: Fundamental Concepts of FX Makeup
FX airbrushing and body painting
Create zombies, monsters and aliens

items.title: How To Apply Makeup Like a Pro

visible_instructors.name: Shalini
visible_instructors.job_title: Celebrity Makeup Artist  Author of Passport To Beauty Expert
visible_instructors.title: Shalini Vadhera

items.headline: Everything you need to know to apply makeup like a pro. Get behind the scenes tips & tricks to getting a flawless look!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have mastered applying makeup like a professional makeup artist to yourself or to your clients
